p.k: Known for his fusion of rock, hip-hop, electronic music and jazz, trumpeter Erik Truffaz is joined on stage by Marcello Giuliani on bass, Benoit Carboz on keys, Arthur Hnatek on drums, and Oxmo Puccino on vocals.
p.d: WorldStock, a festival of international music, launched in 2013. It modestly tries to bring together identities and stories through music creation. The geopolitical context proves a source of unending inspiration. The festival's 2015 edition presented a diverse range of artists, including the French trumpeter Erik Truffaz and his quartet. Known for his fusion of rock, hip-hop, electronic music and jazz, Truffaz is joined on stage by Marcello Giuliani on bass, Benoit Carboz on keys, Arthur Hnatek on drums, and Oxmo Puccino on vocals.
